DataElement.preferredName: HIV Infection Diagnosis Relationship Primary Disease or Disorder Timepoint Interval
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of when the diagnosis of human immunodeficiency virus infection was made relative to the diagnosis of primary disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: HIV Infection Diagnosis Relationship Primary Disease or Disorder Timepoint
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An infection caused by the human immunodeficiency virus._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: any state accompanied by evidence of HIV in the body (positive test for HIV genome, cDNA, proteins, antigens, or antibodies); may be medically asymptomatic or symptomatic; prefer AIDS when appropriate.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: An infection caused by the human immunodeficiency virus.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Property.preferredName: Relationship Primary Disease or Disorder Timepoint
Property.preferredDefinition: Related; connected or associated.:Occurring first in time or sequence; original. (American Heritage Dictionary):Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An infection caused by the human immunodeficiency virus._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.
